I am a 24 years old guy, interested in a wide variety of topics and activities. I spend most of my time trying to find answers to questions that my mind throws at me. Here is a list of few things which I follow :

Music - With Interests ranging from Beethoven to Kishore Kumar, it is basically the primary source of entertainment in my life.

Physics and Cosmology - I can remember myself as a child looking up the night sky and wondering what is all this?

Psychology and Philosophy - two heavy words, but a bit of Neitzsche in time of despair surely helps.

Food and Cooking - Tandoori Chicken, Sushi, idli dosa, Rajma Chawal, nimbu pani, bring it all!
